short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to manage and send data to webhooks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Webhooks Hub enables users to send the URL of the current tab to a selected webhook with a single click. Users can save up to 3 webhooks to send data.

Easily send the URL of your active webpage to a webhook URL from Pabbly Connect or Flowmattic or Zapier and then perform automation based on your needs.

The extension provides a user-friendly interface to add, edit, and delete webhooks, making it easy to integrate with various web services.

Example use cases of this extension:
1. Get content from webpage and create business prompt for AI based services
2. Check if the webpage has any email ID and if so send it to a Google Sheet
3. Send data of webpage to a CRM like Hubspot
